metadata.title: Rapid random access detection of the novel SARS-coronavirus-2 (SARS-CoV-2, previously 2019-nCoV) using an open access protocol for the Panther Fusion
metadata.author: Anne K. Cordes, Albert Heim

introduction: Adaption of an already published real time PCR for SARS-CoV-2 to a fully automatic, random access PCR system.
Detection of all SARS-CoV (from 2002, which may be soon labelled as SARS-CoV-1, and SARS-CoV-2) with a PCR for the highly conserved E gene region.

summary: Adaption of an already published real time PCR for SARS-CoV-2 to a fully automatic, random access PCR system.
Detection of all SARS-CoV with a PCR for the highly conserved E gene region.
Differentiation of SARS-CoV-2 with a PCR for the RdRp Gene.
